code: import{createSelector}from"reselect";var selectDropDown=function selectDropDown(state){return state.dropDownOptions;};export var selectAssets=createSelector([selectDropDown],function(dropDownOptions){return dropDownOptions.assetDropDown;});export var selectUsers=createSelector([selectDropDown],function(dropDownOptions){return dropDownOptions.userDropDown;});export var selectModels=createSelector([selectDropDown],function(dropDownOptions){return dropDownOptions.modelDropDown;});
